short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display the latest $APE price in USD. Price is updated once every 5 minutes using the CoinGecko API.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Shows the current ApeCoin price supplied by CoinGeko API in the browser toolbar.

An ApeCoin icon is displayed in the Chrome toolbar with a price that is updated every 5 minutes.

Get a quick look at the ApeCoin price without accessing any website.
